attributes.action: Reopen gyms in Wales on the 12th April
attributes.additional_details: Reopen gyms and fitness centres on the 12th April. When they were open last year the infection rate was lower the the majority of places and they provide unmeasurable benefits for both physical and mental health.
attributes.background: Reopen gyms in Wales on the 12th April like they are in England, in order to value health and fitness as highly as garden centres

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.  

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here:
https://petitions.senedd.wales/Y
